description: Approval of details pursuant to conditions 1 (refuse store), 8 (landscape details), 9 (railings), 10 (disabled parking) and 11 (entry system) of planning permission ref. P011902, dated 6/11/01.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  Please note that Conditions 2, 5, 6, and 7 did not require the submission of details for discharge.  Nevertheless, your comments relating to these conditions are noted.
